text: @realDonaldTrump OH THANK GOD now I've completely forgotten how you bungled the handling of the covid-19 virus, how you fired Obama's pandemic response team, how you said it was the flue, how people took #Hydroxycloroquine and died, how you honestly thought infecting disinfectant was a thing.....
